author: customer
text: It’s been two weeks and my writing utensil has not shipped yet. There was never an update on the shipping status emailed to me. I called the customer service number and was told that it was not in stock and had to be ordered from the manufacturer. This is all perfectly acceptable, but the lines of communication are not. When logging in to search my recent transactions in order to see if I had maybe made a mistake in checking out, I received an error instead of information about the status of my order. I’m not one to complain, but this issue should be resolved, especially on a site that sells such high end merchandise.
title: Lack of Communication

author: YC
text: overall good, however as a member in Canada, I found the consignment is very difficult. I paid shipping myself, Im okay with that. The problem is I cannot get my consignment item returned if it is not eligible for listing(even if I tried to pay for the return shipping cost) another thing is some of item description is slapdash, for example they often put an automatic watch in quartz watch category which make buyer confused. My item usually sold within a month here, that's pretty good, however the overall experience still need to be improved.
title: consign experience in Canada
